item.title: By Way of a First Post
item.description: Hi everyone, This is my official first blog post and I have been hemming and hawing a bit about what I’d like to write about. I probably won’t get very far with this but at least I’ll use it to mention a few things that I have been thinking about lately and that I might take the time to pursue a bit further. In no particular order, here are some things that have been on my mind.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m George Matthews – welcome to my blog! I am a philosophy professor who also likes to mess around with websites, which I’ve mostly used for classes I teach. I have finally decided to create my own website. You’ll find here some things I have been working on lately in connection with courses I teach, and maybe if I can sit still long enough, occasional blog posts. This site is built with a static site generator called hugo which takes a collection of pages written basically as text files and turns them into a full-fledged website.

item.title: Online Texts
item.description: Here are a couple of projects I have been working on in the last few years.

item.title: Science Slideshows
item.description: This is all pretty self-explanatory – these are some slideshows, produced once again with xaringan and R-Studio and open for reuse and remixing.

item.title: Ethics Slideshows
item.description: These are the latest iteration of online teaching materials for a distance learning ethics course I have been teaching for the last (gasp!!) 20 years.

item.title: Intro Slideshows
item.description: These slideshows were created for use in on online Introduction to Philosophy course.
